content.en_US:
Gasous fraction of the [[vacuum oil processing|Vacuum Oil Processing]] using [[desulfurized crude oil|Hydrotreating]] ("Oil 3.5"). It is also obtained by cracking [[reformate|Reformate]] and [[heavy heating oil|Heavy Heating Oil]]. Reformate gas is also a byproduct of the [[reforming|Reforming]] process in some recipes.

It is used in the production of [[high-performance solvent|High-Performance Solvent]], [[saturnite|Saturnite]], and other end-game recipes.
